name: GENESIS AT THE CROSSROADS
sampleDescriptions: Outreach to House and Senate offices to educate Members of Congress and staff on the work Genesis is doing in Chicago and around the country on Peacebuilding, youth leadership and education, Entrepren
Informational outreach to House and Senate offices to brief them on the educational work being done by Genesis at the Crossroads in Chicago, IL, statewide, nationwide and worldwide.
